descriptions:
['DescriptionA perfect fit for young couples, newly-weds, working men and women and small families, the rental apartments in Horizon Tower are nothing less than a cosy nest built on a spacious floor plan. These flats are mostly made up of fully, partially and unfurnished studios, 1BHK and 2BHK options. Each nest consists of high-quality flooring, lighting, fittings and fixtures making it ready to hop-in anytime. Polished marble counter-tops, cabinets and built-in wardrobes are also included. The apartments in Horizon Tower typically range from 700 sq. ft. to 2,478 sq. ft. The residents enjoy beach-view balconies, separate maid’s room and attached bathrooms built in premium quality finishes. These flats exude a sense of cosines that’s hard to find for expats living far away from their homes in other countries. It also helps that the contemporary architecture is one of a kind.
Features:-
* Big Studio
* 1 Bath
* Fitted Kitchen
* Balcony
* 24 Hour Security Service
* Kitchen with cupboards and counter-tops
* Covered Parking Spaces
Call us for further assistance

descriptions:
['DescriptionELAN TOWNHOUSES by MAJID AL FUTTAIM ( Tilal Al Ghaf )
3 Bedroom 2,152 sq. ft - From AED 1,259,000
4 Bedroom 2,354 sq. ft - From AED 1,600,000
Booking with only 5%
45% During Construction
10% Upon Handover
40% post handover in 3 years
Features:
Dubai International Airport - 29 min
Al Makhtoum International Airport - 25 min
Mall of the Emirates - 15 min
Downtown - 20 min
Dubai Expo - 10 min
Al Qudra cycling track - 17 min
Tilal Al Ghaf is Majid Al Futtaims flagship mixed-use community in Dubai, offering luxury
resort-like living around Lagoon Al Ghaf, a recreational lagoon with sandy white beaches.
Spanning over 3 million square metres, the community will provide walkable neighborhoods
featuring high-quality villas, townhouses and apartments. These are connected by pathways,
natural, open spaces and parks, complemented by vibrant retail, dining, leisure and cultural options. Designed as an exclusive gated enclave within Tilal Al Ghaf, Elan provides the perfect getaway from busy city life.
When you come home to Elan, you leave the world far behind. Elan offers the perfect lifestyle for the modern family. With high-quality three and four bedroom duplex townhouses, nature-inspired outdoors and resort-style amenities including swimming pools, community and fitness centres.']
